channel.name: BBC One NL
channel.title: Escape to the Country
channel.desc: The house hunters are preparing for a triumphant homecoming after a quarter of a century living in Sweden. Nicki Chapman will be leading the pair in their search for a perfect rural Wiltshire home for their ?450,000 budget. Away from the house hunt, Nicki takes the reigns on a ride with a professional Carriage Driver.
